Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.name: write(_:)
Protocols/TerminalControlling.html#/s:4a.abstract: Writes the given string in the terminal.

Protocols/KeyReading.html#/s:4acho10KeyR.name: subscribe(subscriber:)
Protocols/KeyReading.html#/s:4acho10KeyR.abstract: Subscribes to key events. It blocks the thread until an exit or enter event is delivered.

Protocols/KeyReading.html.name: KeyReading
Protocols/KeyReading.html.abstract: Protocol that defines the interface for subscribing

Protocols/TerminalControlling.html.name: TerminalControlling
Protocols/TerminalControlling.html.abstract: Protocol that defines the interface to interact with the terminal.

Extensions/TerminalController.html#/s:5B.name: write(_:)
Extensions/TerminalController.html#/s:5B.abstract: Writes the given string in the terminal.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: hexDescription
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns the hex representation of the data

Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.name: items
Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.abstract: List of options the user can select from.

Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.name: select()
Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.abstract: Selects the option at the current index.

Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.name: up()
Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.abstract: Move the selected line one line up.

Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.name: down()
Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.abstract: Move the selected line one line down.

Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.name: output()
Classes/AchoState.html#/s:4acho9AchoStat.abstract: Returns the terminal output for the given state.

Classes/Acho.html#/s:4acho4AchoC3askxSgy.name: ask()
Classes/Acho.html#/s:4acho4AchoC3askxSgy.abstract: Prints the question and the options in the terminal and subscribes to key events

Classes/AchoState.html.name: AchoState
Classes/AchoState.html.abstract: It represents the state of the prompt.
